question:
Keyboard shortcut for changing text alignment to the left in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• In MS Word 365, Ctrl + L is the shortcut key used to align text to the left margin of the document.
  • This is the default alignment for most documents.
  • It ensures that all lines of the selected paragraph start from the same left margin.

Additional Information:

  • Ctrl + R aligns text to the right .
  • Ctrl + J applies justified alignment (both left and right).
  • Ctrl + C is used to copy the selected text.

question:
Option in Word 365 to manually review and correct spelling and grammar?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The Spelling and Grammar Check feature in MS Word 365 allows users to manually identify and correct spelling and grammatical errors .
  • It provides suggestions and explanations for each flagged word or sentence.
  • This helps in improving the accuracy and professionalism of the document.

Additional Information:

  • Thesaurus is used to find synonyms and antonyms.
  • Word Count shows the total number of words, characters, etc.
  • AutoCorrect automatically fixes commonly misspelled words as you type.

question:
Default font style and size in Word 365 on new document?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• In MS Word 365 on Windows 10, the default font when a new document is opened is Calibri , and the default size is 11 points .
  • This setting provides a clean and modern look that is easy to read and widely accepted in professional documents.
  • Users can manually change this default by modifying the Normal template .

Additional Information:

  • Arial and Times New Roman are popular fonts but not default in recentWord versions.
  • Aharoni is a Hebrew font and not used by default in English-language documents.
  • You can change the default font via: Home tab→ Font group → Dialog launcher → Set As Default .

question:
What does the ‘Search’ or ‘Find’ allow you to do in Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_3: Locate specific words or topics in the Help content
solution:
• In MS Word 365, the ‘Search’ or ‘Find’ feature allows users to locate specific words, phrases, or topics within the document or within the Help system.
  • It is especially helpful in long documents to navigate quickly to the desired section.
  • It improves productivity by eliminating the need to scroll manually.

Additional Information:

  • Shortcut key: Ctrl + F opens the Navigation Pane for searching within the document.
  • The Help search (in “Tell Me” or F1 help) finds features and help topics.
  • Does not change fonts or print the document directly.

question:
Which option allows you to create a table in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• In MS Word 365 , to create a new table, the Insert tab is used where the Table Insertion option is located.
  • You can insert a table by choosing the number of rows and columns or using Draw Table or Quick Tables .
  • This helpsorganise data in a structured format.

Additional Information:

  • Table Layout and Table Design appear after a table is inserted, for formatting purposes.
  • Table Creation is not an actual feature name in MS Word.
  • The Insert→ Table option is the standard method.

question:
Word 365 feature to search and replace text?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• In Microsoft Word 365, the Find and Replace feature allows users to search for a specific word or phrase and replace it with another throughout the document.
  • It is useful for quickly updating terms, correcting repeated errors, orstandardising terminology.
  • This feature is found under the Home tab or accessed via Ctrl + H shortcut.

Additional Information:

  • Cut and Paste is used for moving text.
  • Spelling & Grammar checks errors but doesn’t replace custom words.
  • Font Formatting changes style, not content.

question:
Purpose of applying shading to a table in Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_1: To sort the data in the table
option_2: To adjust the column widths in the table
option_3: To highlight specific cells or rows in the table
option_4: To change the font colour within the table
solution:
• In Microsoft Word 365, shading is used to highlight specific cells, rows, or columns in a table by applying a backgroundcolour .
  • It helps make important data stand out visually and improves readability.
  • Shading does not affect the text or structure , only the background appearance.

Additional Information:

  • Sorting data and adjusting column widths are done via other layout options.
  • Fontcolour is changed through Font settings , not shading.

question:
Shortcut to open a new blank document in Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• In Microsoft Word 365, Ctrl + N is the keyboard shortcut used to open a new, blank document quickly.
  • This helps users create a new file without going through the menu options.
  • It improves workflow and saves time during document creation.

Additional Information:

  • Ctrl + O is used to open an existing file.
  • Ctrl + P opens the Print window.
  • Ctrl + S is used to save the current document.

question:
What is the purpose of ‘Print Preview’ in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_1: To create a digital backup of the document
option_2: To automatically correct spelling and grammar errors
option_3: To adjust page layout and formatting before printing
option_4: To convert the document to a different file format
solution:
• The Print Preview feature in MS Word 365 lets you view how your document will appear when printed .
  • It helps in identifying and correcting layout, spacing, or formatting issues before sending the file to the printer.
  • It ensures your document looks professional and aligned as expected.

Additional Information:

  • It is accessed through File→ Print or by pressing Ctrl + P .
  • It is especially useful for checking headers, footers, margins, and page breaks .
  • Print Preview does not correct spelling or convert file types .

question:
Option within Insert tab used to place a table in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• In MS Word 365, the Table option under the Insert tab→ Table group is used to insert a table into the document.
  • It allows users to select the number of rows and columns and place a table at the desired location.
  • The other options like Copy, Cut, and Paste are used for content editing, not table insertion.

Additional Information:

  • You can also use Draw Table or Insert Table options for advanced control.
  • Shortcut: Go to Insert→ Table , then drag to choose dimensions.

question:
Shortcut to ‘align right’ text in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• In MS-Word 365 , Ctrl + R is the shortcut key used to right-align the selected text.
  • This aligns the text along the right margin of the page.
  • It is commonly used in documents for formatting headers, footers, and other right-aligned elements.

Additional Information:

  • Ctrl + L : Aligns text to the left .
  • Ctrl + E : Aligns text to the centre .
  • Ctrl + J : Justifies the text (aligns both left and right margins).
  • Ctrl + U : Underlines the selected text.

question:
Shortcut to apply bullets in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• In MS Word 365 , pressing Ctrl + Shift + L instantly applies the default bullet style to the selected text or paragraph.
  • It is a quick way to create bulleted lists without using the ribbon.
  • This shortcut works for single and multiple lines selected together.

Additional Information:

  • You cancustomise bullets from the Home tab→ Paragraph group → Bullets dropdown .
  • The default bullet symbol is usually a black dot (•), but you can change it to symbols or images.

question:
What does the Grammar check focus on in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The Grammar check in MS Word 365 primarily focuses on sentence structure, syntax, subject-verb agreement, punctuation, and other grammar rules .
  • Spelling errors are handled separately by the Spelling check feature.
  • Hence, Grammar check does not focus on spelling .

Additional Information:

  • Grammar & Spelling check together is available under Review→ Spelling & Grammar .
  • Grammar suggestions are typically marked with a blue underline , while spelling errors are marked in red .

question:
Shortcut key to save document in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• In MS Word 365 , pressing Ctrl + S saves the current document to the selected location on your computer or cloud.
  • This shortcut helps prevent loss of data by saving progress instantly.
  • It works whether it’s a new document or an already saved one.

Additional Information:

  • Ctrl + A = Select All
  • Ctrl + V = Paste
  • Ctrl + X = Cut
  • Ctrl + S = Save

question:
What does ‘Header’ section allow in Page Setup in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_2: Add a header with text or page numbers to the top of each page
option_3: Change the line spacing of the document
solution:
• In MS Word 365 , the Header section in the Page Setup dialog box lets you define space and content at the top of each page .
  • You can add elements like titles, dates, page numbers , or other identifying info.
  • It helps in maintaining uniform layout and professional formatting .

Additional Information:

  • Header content repeats on all pages unless customized.
  • Footer is the similar section at the bottom of the page .

question:
Option to adjust line spacing in paragraph in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The Line Spacing option lets you increase or decrease the vertical space between lines in a paragraph (e.g., single, 1.5, double).
  • It’s found on the Home tab→ Paragraph group → Line and Paragraph Spacing button.
  • Proper line spacing improves readability and layout consistency in your document.

Additional Information:

  • You can use keyboard shortcuts like Ctrl+ 1 for single, Ctrl+ 5 for 1.5, and Ctrl+ 2 for double spacing.
  • The Paragraph dialog box offers more settings (At least, Exactly, Multiple).
  • Adjusting line spacing does not affect paragraph indentation or borders.

question:
What happens when you press Backspace after selecting text in Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_1: The text is copied to the clipboard
option_2: The text is deleted to the left of the cursor
option_3: The text is formatted with a bold style
option_4: The text is moved to the end of the document
solution:
• When text is selected in MS Word 365, pressing Backspacedeletes the entire selection , removing it from the document.
  • Backspace normally deletes characters to the left of the cursor, but with a selection, it removes that selection instead.
  • The deleted text is not copied to the clipboard (unless you use Cut), and you can reverse the deletion with Ctrl+ Z .

Additional Information:

  • Delete key behaves similarly but removes characters to the right of the cursor or deletes the selection.
  • To cut selected text and store it on the clipboard, use Ctrl+ X instead of Backspace.
  • You can undo the deletion immediately using Ctrl+ Z or the Undo button.

question:
Formatting feature to make text bold/italic/underlined in Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• Font styling provides commands like Bold (Ctrl+ B) , Italic (Ctrl+ I) , and Underline (Ctrl+ U) toemphasise text.
  • It allows you to highlight important words or phrases , improving readability and emphasis.
  • Font styling options are found in the Home tab→ Font group on the ribbon.

Additional Information:

  • Text wrapping controls how text flows around images or objects, not emphasis.
  • Page margins adjust the document’s layout boundaries, unrelated to text formatting.
  • Hyperlinking embeds links in text, without changing font emphasis.

question:
Operation done using Ctrl + Shift + > in Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• Ctrl + Shift + > increases the selected text’s font size by one preset increment each time it’s pressed.
  • It provides a quick way to enlarge text without manually selecting a size from the ribbon.
  • This shortcut works on any selected text or caret position in Word.

Additional Information:

  • The opposite command Ctrl + Shift + < decreases font size.
  • You can also use the Font Size dropdown on the Home tab for precise sizing.
  • Shortcut speed depends on your system’s font increment settings.

question:
In MS Word 365: Ctrl + X is used for copying / Ctrl + V is used for moving — which is correct?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• Ctrl + X cuts (removes) the selected content, it does not copy.
  • Ctrl + V pastes content from the clipboard; it does not itself move content.
  • Therefore, neither statement accurately describes the behavior of these shortcuts.

Additional Information:

  • To copy , use Ctrl + C ; to move , cut with Ctrl + X then paste with Ctrl + V .
  • The clipboard temporarily holds cut or copied content until it’s pasted.
  • You can undo any cut, copy, or paste action with Ctrl + Z .

question:
Primary purpose of bullets and numbering in MS Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_1: To adjust the margins and spacing of the document.
option_2: To organize information into lists or sequences.
option_3: To highlight text with a different font or colour.
option_4: To indicate the importance of specific text.
solution:
• Bullets and numbering help structure content by breaking it into clear, easily readable points or steps.
  • They improve scannability , allowing readers to quickly locate key items in a document.
  • These tools also support hierarchical organization , showing relationships between main points and subpoints.

Additional Information:

  • You can access bullets and numbering from the Home tab→ Paragraph group .
  • Multilevel lists combine bullets and numbers to represent complex outlines.
  • Consistent use of lists enhances the professional appearance of reports and manuals.

question:
Example of table style in Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• Plain Grid is a builtin table style in MS Word 365 that applies simple grid borders around all cells.
  • It can be applied via Table Design→ Table Styles on the ribbon.
  • Table styles like Plain Grid automatically handle borders, shading , and banded rows/columns for a consistent look.

Additional Information:

  • MLA , APA , and Chicago Manual of Style are citation and formatting standards for documents, not table formatting styles.
  • You can customize table styles by modifying border weights, colors, and fill effects under the Table Design tab.
  • Applying a table style ensures uniform formatting across multiple tables in your document.

question:
Move cursor to beginning of document in Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• Pressing Ctrl + Home instantly moves the cursor to the very beginning of the document.
  • This shortcut is much faster than scrolling through the entire document.
  • It works in any view (Print Layout, Draft, Web Layout) in Word 365.

Additional Information:

  • Ctrl + End moves the cursor to the end of the document.
  • Ctrl +PgUp / PgDn navigates up or down by one screenful (page) , not to document boundaries.
  • For jumping to specific lines or pages, use F5 (Go To) .

question:
Group in Insert tab for creating a table in Word 365?

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The Tables group on the Insert tab provides commands like Insert Table , Draw Table , and Quick Tables to create and format tables.
  • You can specify the number of rows and columns or manually draw cell boundaries for custom layouts.
  • Quick Tables offers predesigned table templates for rapid insertion and consistent styling.

Additional Information:

  • The Pages group is used for adding Cover Page , Blank Page , or Page Break , not tables.
  • The Links group manages Hyperlinks , Bookmarks , and Cross-references , not table creation.
  • The Illustrations group lets you insert Pictures , Shapes , Icons , SmartArt , and Charts , not tables.

question:
Shortcut key to insert a hyperlink in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The shortcut key to insert a hyperlink in MSWord 365 is Ctrl+ K .
  • Pressing Ctrl+ K opens the Insert Hyperlink dialog box.
  • Other listed combinations do not invoke the hyperlink feature.

Additional Information:

  • You can also insert a link by rightclicking a selected text and choosing Link .
  • Alternatively, go to the Insert tab→ Link group→ Hyperlink .
  • Hyperlinks can point to web pages, email addresses, or other documents.

question:
Text alignment to left margin in Microsoft Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The option that aligns text along the left margin is Left Align .
  • Left Align leaves the right edge of the paragraph uneven (ragged).
  • You can apply it via Home tab→ Paragraph group → Align Left or by pressing Ctrl + L .

Additional Information:

  • Center Align centrestext between margins; Right Align flushes text to the right; Justify evens text across both margins.
  • The alignment options appear in the Paragraph group on the Home tab, in the order: Align Left, Center Align, Align Right, Justify.
  • Left Align (Ctrl + L) is the default and most commonly used alignment for paragraphs.

question:
Tab in MS Word 365 to customise page size in Page Setup dialog

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The Layout tab contains the Page Setup group, where clicking the dialog launcher opens the Page Setup dialog box tocustomise page size.
  • Within Layout→ Page Setup → Size dropdown you can choose common sizes or click More Paper Sizes… to enter custom dimensions.
  • Neither the Insert tab nor the File tab offers direct page size controls, and there is no separate Edit tab in Word.

Additional Information:

  • The Insert tab is used for adding objects like tables, pictures, and charts.
  • The File tab opens the Backstage view for filelevel tasks (Save, Print, Options), but page size customisation resides on the Layout tab.
  • You can also access Page Setup via Print→ Page Setup before printing, but indocument customisation belongs to Layout.

question:
Document settings that can be changed from Layout tab in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The Layout tab contains the Margins option in the Page Setup group.
  • From Layout→ Margins , you can select preset margins or define custom margins.
  • The other settings (Change styles, Macros, Spelling grammar) are located on different tabs.

Additional Information:

  • You can open thefull Page Setup dialog via the launcher in the Page Setup group on the Layout tab.
  • Change Styles is under the Design or Home tab’s Styles group.
  • Spelling & Grammar is under the Review tab; Macros appear in the Developer or View tab.

question:
NOT used to edit text in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_2: Making text as Left align
solution:
• The action “Left Align Text” refers to paragraph alignment, not editing the text’s content or style.
  • Editing text involves modifying character properties like font color, font style, and making text bold or italic.
  • Therefore, “Left Align Text” is NOT used to edit text.

Additional Information:

  • Text editing (character formatting) options reside in the Font group on the Home tab .
  • Alignment options are in the Paragraph group on the Home tab and affect paragraph layout.
  • To align text, you use buttons like Align Left (Ctrl+ L) , Center Align , Align Right , and Justify —none of which change the text itself.

question:
Command used to print a document in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• To print a document in MSWord 365, use File→ Print .
  • You can also press Ctrl + P as a shortcut to open the Print dialog.
  • This opens the Backstage Print view where you set printer, copies, and page range.

Additional Information:

  • The Print option in the File tab provides page preview and print settings in the Backstage view.
  • View, Home, and Design tabs do not contain printing commands; they focus on layout, editing, and styling.
  • From the Print view you can also export to PDF or XPS via the same menu.

question:
Shortcut for opening a new document in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The keyboard shortcut to open a new document in MSWord 365 when another document is already open is Ctrl + N .
  • Pressing Ctrl + N instantly creates a new blank document in a separate window or tab.
  • Other shortcuts perform different actions: printing, saving, or redoing.

Additional Information:

  • Ctrl + P opens the Print dialog, Ctrl + S saves the current document, and Ctrl + Y repeats the last action.
  • You can also create a new document via File→ New → Blank document in the Backstage view.
  • Using Ctrl + Shift + N resets styles to Normal in some Word versions, but Ctrl + N is the standard for new documents.

question:
Position of the menu bar in relation to the title bar in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_1: Menu bar is situated to the left of the title bar.
option_2: Menu bar is situated above the title bar.
option_3: Menu bar is situated below the title bar.
option_4: Menu bar is situated to the right of the title bar.
solution:
• The menu bar (Ribbon) is situated below the title bar in MS Word 365.
  • It appears directly under the document title and window control buttons.
  • The Ribbon contains tabs like Home, Insert, Design, etc., providing quick access to commands.

Additional Information:

  • The title bar displays the document name along with minimize, maximize, and close buttons.
  • You can toggle the Ribbon’s visibility by pressing Ctrl + F1 or clicking the Ribbon Display Options icon.
  • The Quick Access Toolbar is positioned adjacent to the title bar, either above or below the Ribbon based on your settings.

question:
Option to print odd-numbered pages in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• To print only the odd-numbered pages (1, 3, 5, …), select Print Odd pages in the Print settings.
  • In the Print dialog (File→ Print), under Settings , click the dropdown that defaults to “Print All Pages” and choose Print Odd pages .
  • This filters the job so only pages with odd numbers are sent to the printer.

Additional Information:

  • To print even-numbered pages instead, choose Print Even pages from the same dropdown.
  • You can also specify individual pages or ranges manually (e.g., “1,3,5” in the Pages box).
  • The Print command itself just opens the print interface; you always control odd/even filtering under Settings .

question:
Difference between ‘Save’ and ‘Save As’ in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_1: ‘Save’ is used to save the document in the cloud storage, while ‘Save As’ is used to save the document on the local computer.
option_2: ‘Save’ is used to save the document with a new filename or in a different location, while ‘Save As’ is used to save the document for the first time.
option_3: Both ‘Save’ and ‘Save As’ perform the same function of saving the document; they are just two different names for the same command.
option_4: ‘Save’ is used to save the document for the first time, while ‘Save As’ is used to save the document with a new filename or in a different location.
solution:
• ‘Save’ saves changes directly to the current file; for a brand-new document it prompts you to choose a location and name.
  • ‘Save As’ always opens the dialog to assign a new filename or location, letting you keep the original document unchanged.
  • After the initial save, pressing ‘Save’ quickly updates the existing file, whereas ‘Save As’ creates a separate copy each time.

Additional Information:

  • The quick-access Save icon runs ‘Save’, while ‘Save As’ is found under File→ Save As with format and location options.
  • ‘Save’ does not prompt after the first save; ‘Save As’ opens itsdialog on every use.
  • Use ‘Save As’ to version your work or to generate templates without overwriting the source.

question:
Page Setup option that changes document orientation in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• The Orientation option controls whether the page is laid out vertically (Portrait) or horizontally (Landscape) .
  • You find it on the Layout tab→ Page Setup group → Orientation .
  • Portrait orientation displays content top-to-bottom; Landscape displays content left-to-right.

Additional Information:

  • Margins set the space around the edges of the page.
  • Columns dividesthe page into multiple text columns.
  • Paper Size selects the physical dimensions of the page.
  • Changing Orientation can affect printing layout and how headers/footers appear.

question:
Action to replace a word throughout document in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• Find and Replace allows you to replace a specific word or phrase throughout the entire document (shortcut Ctrl+H ).
  • It appears under the Home > Replace menu.

Additional Information:

  • You can enable Match case and Findwhole words only for more accurate replacements.
  • Clicking Replace All updates every occurrence at once; Replace lets you confirm each change individually.

question:
Shortcut key to open help tab in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• F1 opens the Help tab in the menu bar .
  • It also launches the Tell Me search box for quick command lookup .
  • Provides a consistent way to access help across all Office applications .

Additional Information:

  • You can press Ctrl+F1 to toggle the ribbon display.
  • Accessing online help requires an active internet connection .
  • Pressing F1 in a dialog box brings up contextual help for that feature.

question:
How to access ‘Save As’ in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_1: By right-clicking on the document and selecting ‘Save As’
option_2: By going to the File tab and selecting ‘Save As’
option_3: By using the keyboard shortcut ‘Ctrl + S’
option_4: By clicking on the ‘Save’ icon
solution:
• Go to the File tab and select Save As .
  • This opens the Save As dialog where you choose location, filename, and format.
  • Press F12 as a shortcut to directly open the Save As dialog.

Additional Information:

  • Right-click > Save As isn’t always available in every context; the File tab method is universal.
  • Ctrl+S simply saves the current document without prompting for a new name.
  • In the Save As dialog you can select local folders or cloud locations like OneDrive .

question:
Tab for text formatting like font and size in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
solution:
• Home tab provides options to format text, including font style , font size , fontcolour , and paragraph alignment .
  • The Font group within the Home tab allows selecting font face, size, and text effects.
  • The Paragraph group and Styles gallery enable quick paragraph formatting and applying predefined styles.

Additional Information:

  • The Page Layout tab is used for page setup, margins, and page orientation.
  • The File tab opens the Backstage view for saving, opening, and printing documents.
  • The Insert tab provides tools to insert tables, pictures, shapes, and other objects.

question:
Purpose of ‘Center Align’ in MS Word 365

SSC Delhi Police Constable – 2023
option_1: It centres the text horizontally between the margins
option_2: It adds extra spacing between words
option_3: It aligns the text along the left margin
option_4: It aligns the text along the right margin
solution:
• Positions lines so that each line iscentred horizontally between the left and right margins.
  • Provides a symmetrical layout often used for titles and headings.
  • Can be applied from the Home > Paragraph group or via the shortcut Ctrl+E .

Additional Information:

  • Useful for formatting titles, headings, and captions to enhance visual appeal.
  • Works on selected paragraphs or the entire document.
  • Complements other alignment options like Left Align, Right Align, and Justify.
